solution_line_template: He has earned ${earnings_from_start} from starting the walks because {num_dogs_walked} x {charge_per_start} = <<{num_dogs_walked}*{charge_per_start}={earnings_from_start}>>{earnings_from_start}

He has to earn ${remaining_to_earn_from_distance} from distance, because {amount_per_member} - {earnings_from_start} = <<{amount_per_member}-{earnings_from_start}={remaining_to_earn_from_distance}>>{remaining_to_earn_from_distance}

He has to walk {total_blocks_to_walk} blocks because {remaining_to_earn_from_distance} / {charge_per_block} = <<{remaining_to_earn_from_distance}/{charge_per_block}={total_blocks_to_walk}>>{total_blocks_to_walk}
